Class HTTPServer

java.lang.Object
com.example.SpotifyWebAPI.HTTP.HTTPServer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class HTTPServer extends Object implements Runnable
Starts and manages the HTTP Server Runs asynchronously

  • Constructor Details

    • HTTPServer

      public HTTPServer(int port, int backlog)
      Server constructor
      Parameters:
      port - Set the port the server will run on
      backlog - Set the limit of connections for the socket

    • StartServer

      public void StartServer()
      Deprecated.
      Starts the server on a new thread. Switched to using Runnable interface instead

    • ResponseBody

      private String ResponseBody(File file, Charset encoding) throws IOException
      Gets the file and encodes it with specified Charset encoding
      Parameters:
      file - File to be encoded
      encoding - Encoding to use
      Returns:
      Encoded file in string
      Throws:
      IOException - If the file cannot be read

    • GetRequestedFile

      private File GetRequestedFile(String fileNameWithExtension)
      Deprecated.
      Gets the requested file. Using new way to get Folder structure and files instead, GetFolders(String requestedFile)
      Parameters:
      fileNameWithExtension - Name of the requested file with extension
      Returns:
      Return the requested file

    • GetFolders

      private File GetFolders(String requestedFile)
      Gets files in folders by building the String path as File object
      Parameters:
      requestedFile - Requested file
      Returns:
      Entire file path. If the string ends without any file extensions it returns index.html

    • GetFilename

      private String GetFilename(String requestType)
      Gets the requested file name with extension
      Parameters:
      requestType - Requested file
      Returns:
      Name of the file with extension

    • GetIndexPage

      private File GetIndexPage()
      Gets the index.html from parent directory
      Returns:
      Returns index.html

    • StartListening

      private void StartListening()
      Starts listening on the specified socket. It reads HTTP requests and tries to get the requested files Depending on the file extension sets the "Content-Type"

    • PostResponse

      private void PostResponse(BufferedWriter out, String body, String contentType, String statusCode) throws IOException
      Sends out the response body with headers
      Parameters:
      out - BufferedWriter object
      body - Body of the response
      contentType - Content type of the response
      statusCode - Status code of the response
      Throws:
      IOException - If the writer is unsuccessful
